title: Kanyama Community Cleanup
description: Major cleanup along Kanyama main road. Bring gloves and bags. Refreshments provided.

title: Kalingalinga Recycling Workshop
description: Learn practical recycling and meet local recyclers. Free training materials.

title: Chawama Waste Sorting Training
description: Hands-on training for proper household waste sorting

title: Lusaka Eco Competition Finals
description: Annual environmental competition with cash prizes and certificates

title: Soweto Market Cleanup
description: Early morning cleanup with market vendors. Free breakfast after cleanup.

title: Compound Leaders Summit
description: Training for community leaders from Kanyama Kalingalinga and Chawama on waste management
